summary: What does the scouter say about his power level?
descriptionHtml:
[center][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/T6APt.png[/IMG][/center]

As as fan of \'Dragon Ball Z\' and \'Skyrim\', I was loving the few DBZ mods and moves being modded in. I did however see no trace of any form of scouter being made. So here\'s this one!

[center][size=4]This mod is standalone and will [b]NOT[/b] replace any vanilla items[/size][/center]

To get the \'[b]Scouter[/b]\' you must craft it using a forge. It comes in [b]five[/b] colours, [b][color=green]Green[/color], [color=red]Red[/color], [color=magenta]Pink[/color], [color=blue]Blue[/color][/b] and [b]White[/b].
It will be listed under the \'Steel\' section and will require 2 \'[b]Steel Ingots[/b]\' and a [b]Gem[/b] of the relevant colour you want to craft. (Emerald=Green, Ruby=Red ect.)
You can also upgrade it using a workbench with 1 \'Refined Moonstone\'

While wearing the Scouter, [u]you will be able to see any living life form that may be present in the area[/u], much like the spell \'Detect Life\' achieves.
I did however, consider using something like the \'[b]Detect Skills spell[/b]\' mod, as it would mirror what the scouter actually does in DBZ. But this requires you to cast it with a spell on individual characters individually, for it to then pause the game and bring up the stat sheets. This is not what I wanted, so I went with something abit more dynamic and fluid. In DBZ the characters using the scouters would always be able to tell when someone was nearby by sensing there power levels and knowing where they are, this effect somewhat achieves this notion.




[b]
=============
---Installation---
=============
[/b][list]
[*] Download with Nexus Mod Manager and make sure its checked under the Mods tab.
[*] Or download manualy and extract to your \\Data folder in your Skyrim directory. Then make sure the \'Scouter.esp\' file is active in the Data section of your SkyrimLauncher.exe.
[/list]


[b]
============
---Changelog---
============
[/b]
[u][b]v1.3[/b][/u]
- Wearable with any form of helmet, circlet or robe simultaneously 
- Removed armour values 
- Removed weight values

[u][b]v1.2[/b][/u]
- Now comes in 5 colours 
- Added \'Detect Life\' properties 
- Slightly changed smithing recipe 
- Tweaked lens texture 
- Fixed Specular levels

[u][b]v1.1[/b][/u]
- Added transparency in the lens 
- Improved mesh 
- Improved textures 
- Added new lens colour

[u][b]v1.0[/b][/u]
- Initial release



[b]
===============
---Special Thanks---
===============
[/b]
Many, many, many thanks to user [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/modules/members/index.php?id=78651][size=3][b]\'MofoMojo\'[/b][/size][/url]. Without his help I wouldn\'t have achieved the \'Detect Life\' effect on my Scouters. I saw he had achieved the effect with a ring and was perfect for what I wanted with this mod.

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=9446]Ring and Spell of Life Sensing[/url]

I tried to replicate this effect with scripts but couldn\'t get any results. I contacted him through the Nexus and told him what was going on. He took a look at what I had so far and offered me guidance on how to fix it. 
Brilliant person, and would recommend to anyone! Go download his mods and endorse






[center][size=4][b]- If you like this, then you might like this -[/b][/size]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13133][img]http://i.imgur.com/8Vz3U.png[/img][/url][/center]
[b]
=============
---Other Mods---
=============
[/b][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11005]Angelic Halos and Demonic Horns[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20900]Bandanas of Skyrim[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13551]Blindfolds of Skyrim[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/33177/]Chitin Goggles[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13133]Dwemer Goggles and Scouter[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7804]ENB and FXAA Remover[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/33391]Face Masks of Skyrim[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=12322]God of War - Blades of Chaos and Athena[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=12720]God of War - Blade of Olympus[/url]
